clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Research on Teratment of Gastrointestinal Cancer in the Preoperative by Propranolol
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Research on Teratment of Gastrointestinal Cancer in the Preoperative by Propranolol

brief_summary.textblock: To research the effect of propranolol on the proliferation and apoptosis of gastrointestinal cancer.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Our experiment completed after patients took medicine for one week.
primary_outcome.description: We used CT and Ki67 to confirm that the drug's affection.

arm_group.description: We used propranolol and placebo as an control drug to treat with patients.

intervention.description: 0 or 1 were generated by using Random software. The patient entered the placebo group if number was 0; if the random number generated was 1, then entered the propranolol group.
